title: Epic 21: Telehealth & Virtual Care
description: Complete telehealth solution with video consultations, virtual waiting rooms, remote follow-ups, and HIPAA-compliant video conferencing. Enables hybrid care delivery.

userStories.title: Telehealth schema
userStories.description: Create database models for telehealth sessions and virtual care.
acceptanceCriteria: TelehealthSession model with appointmentId, roomUrl, status, startTime, endTime
VirtualWaitingRoom model with patientId, joinTime, status
TelehealthConsent model with patientId, consentDate, consentType
SessionRecording model with sessionId, recordingUrl, duration (if enabled)
Add telehealth flag to Appointment model

userStories.title: Video provider integration
userStories.description: Integrate with video conferencing providers for telehealth sessions.
acceptanceCriteria: Create meeting room on appointment creation

userStories.title: Virtual waiting room
userStories.description: Create virtual waiting room for patients before telehealth visits.
acceptanceCriteria: telehealth.admitPatient - Provider admits patient to session

userStories.title: Video consultation interface
userStories.description: Create the video consultation interface for provider and patient.

userStories.title: Telehealth documentation
userStories.description: Document telehealth visits with appropriate modifiers and notes.
acceptanceCriteria: Auto-add telehealth modifier to billing codes
Document technology used and any issues

userStories.title: Telehealth consent management
userStories.description: Manage patient consent for telehealth services.
acceptanceCriteria: telehealth.sendConsent - Send consent form to patient

userStories.title: Remote monitoring integration
userStories.description: Integrate remote patient monitoring for virtual care.

userStories.title: Telehealth dashboard and scheduling
userStories.description: Create UI for managing telehealth appointments and sessions.
acceptanceCriteria: Virtual waiting room dashboard for providers
